ComicInfo.Summary:
"SOMETHING TO FEAR" concludes!
The survivors attempt to pick up the pieces after what they've just lived through.
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creators | Sidebar Location | |-----------------|-----------------|-----------------------------------------|------------------| | 1 | Regular Cover | Charlie Adlard (a) & Cliff Rathburn (c) | 1 | | Second Printing | 2nd Print Cover | Charlie Adlard | 2 |
Note: The second (and third) printings of issues #97-102 connect to create a giant landscape of Negan and Lucille.
